column3: Makes sense.\nFor the sake of documentation simplicity I would be ok with mentioning python3 as simply one of the dependencies and not just for the tests. I think we do that for other platforms.

@laanwj thanks for your input. I fully agree with you in general. For FreeBSD in particular, I think a sysadmin can decide whether installing Python 3 is worthwhile, rather than just adding another dependency. That was my thought process.\n
